newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - CNF Transport upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - CNF Transport upgraded.

text.p: Merrill Lynch & Co said on Wednesday it upgraded CNF Transport Inc to an intermediate and long-term buy, and named it a focus stock.
-- CNF Transport was rated an intermediate-term accumulate and a long-term buy.
-- Further details were not immediately available.
